resource_dependency.searchIcon: Search icon SVG or image file path
resource_dependency.stockDataAPI: An API providing real-time and historical stock data, including company details, prices, financials, dividends, and analyst ratings

function: Enable users to input stock codes or names to initiate a search.
static_description: A search bar component with a placeholder 'Enter stock code or name', positioned prominently at the top of the page. The background is white, and the input field border and text are navy. A search icon is displayed inside or adjacent to the input field.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on the search bar focuses the input field, enabling text entry.
Pressing Enter after typing initiates the search action and clears the suggestion dropdown if visible.

resource_dependency.autoSuggestDropdownStyle: CSS class defining dropdown styles with white background and navy borders/text
resource_dependency.stockSuggestionsAPI: An API endpoint that returns a list of matching stocks based on partial input from the user

function: Provide auto-suggested stock matches dynamically while the user types in the search bar.
static_description: A dropdown list appears below the search bar when typing begins. Each item shows the stock name and symbol. Background is white, text and borders are navy.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking a suggestion populates the search bar with the selected stock identifier and closes the dropdown.
If many suggestions exist, scrolling allows navigation through the list.

resource_dependency.basicStockInfoSchema: Database table schema: stock_id (PK), symbol (string), company_name (string), sector (string), current_price (float), last_updated (datetime)

function: Display essential information about the searched stock such as company name, sector, and latest price.
static_description: A card-style section beneath the search bar displays the company logo (or placeholder), full company name, stock symbol, sector, and current price. All elements use navy text on a white background.

resource_dependency.chartLibrary: Integration with a charting library like Chart.js or D3.js
resource_dependency.marketTrendDataSchema: Table storing time-series data: date (datetime), open_price (float), close_price (float), high (float), low (float), volume (int)

function: Visualize market trends over various periods using interactive charts.
static_description: A line chart showing closing prices over time, with axes labeled and tooltips enabled. Default period is 1 month. Background is white, chart lines and labels are navy.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on different time range buttons (1D, 1W, 1M, 3M, 1Y) updates the chart data accordingly.
Hovering over data points shows detailed tooltip information including exact price and timestamp.

resource_dependency.financialDataTableSchema: Database table: stock_id (FK), fiscal_year (int), revenue (float), net_income (float), eps (float), pe_ratio (float), debt_equity_ratio (float)
resource_dependency.currencyFormatter: Utility function to format large numbers with appropriate currency symbols

function: Present key financial metrics including revenue, earnings, and important financial ratios.
static_description: A tabular view displaying rows per fiscal year with columns for revenue, net income, EPS, P/E ratio, and debt-to-equity ratio. Headers and data are styled in navy on a white background.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking column headers sorts the table ascending/descending by that metric.

resource_dependency.reportTemplateFiles: Pre-defined templates for each supported format

function: Allow users to choose their preferred output format for generated reports.
static_description: A horizontal row of radio buttons or a dropdown menu listing available formats ('PDF', 'Word', 'Markdown', 'HTML'). Selected option is visually highlighted with navy outline/text.

interaction_and_states.description: Selecting an option highlights it and stores the selection for report generation.

resource_dependency.customizationPanelContent: Checkboxes and toggles for selecting sections like 'Market Trends', 'Financial Data', 'Analyst Ratings', etc.
resource_dependency.reportSectionFlagsSchema: Boolean flags indicating inclusion of each customizable section in the final report

function: Let users define which sections and how much detail they want included in the generated report.
static_description: Expandable panel containing checkboxes/toggles grouped under categories like Overview, Financials, Analysis, History. Labels and controls follow navy-on-white theme.

interaction_and_states.description: Toggling any checkbox updates internal settings used during report generation.

resource_dependency.reportGenerationService: Backend service responsible for compiling selected data into chosen format and returning downloadable file

function: Generate and allow download of the fully customized stock report in the selected format.
static_description: A prominent 'Download Report' button featuring a download icon, placed near customization controls. Styled with navy background and white text.

interaction_and_states.description: Triggers report compilation and prompts browser-native file download dialog once complete.

resource_dependency.keyInsightsGeneratorLogic: Algorithm or NLP-based system to extract highlights from stock data
resource_dependency.insightBoxStyle: Card layout with bullet-pointed insights and bold emphasis on key figures

function: Summarize critical findings about the stock in a concise overview section.
static_description: A dedicated summary box presenting 3–5 bullet points summarizing recent performance, valuation status, and risk indicators. Uses navy headings on white background.

resource_dependency.historicalPriceChartSchema: Same as market trend data but extended for multi-year support
resource_dependency.comparisonToolAPI: Optional third-party tool for comparing multiple stocks’ historical performance

function: Illustrate past price movements across longer durations with clear visual cues.
static_description: An expanded version of the market trend chart supporting up to 5 years of data, with optional toggle for logarithmic scale. Axis labels and legend in navy.

interaction_and_states.description: Timeframe selector changes displayed data window.
Shows precise value at cursor position along with date.

resource_dependency.analystRatingSchema: Table: rating_id (PK), stock_id (FK), firm_name (string), recommendation (enum: Buy/Hold/Sell), target_price (float), published_date (date)
resource_dependency.ratingDistributionChart: Bar or pie chart showing distribution of buy/hold/sell recommendations among analysts

function: Expose aggregated professional opinions regarding the stock’s future prospects.
static_description: Two-part display: a list of individual analyst ratings with firm names and recommendations, and a small chart showing overall sentiment distribution. Text and visuals in navy on white.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking individual entries expands to show full commentary or source link if available.

resource_dependency.dividendHistorySchema: Table: dividend_id (PK), stock_id (FK), ex_dividend_date (date), payment_date (date), amount_per_share (float), yield_percentage (float)

function: Convey dividend-related benefits and consistency of payouts over time.
static_description: Timeline-style visualization of past dividend payments with amounts and dates. Accompanied by average annual yield percentage. Navy-colored timeline markers and labels.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on a dividend event reveals additional info such as declaration date or payout frequency notes.

resource_dependency.industryBenchmarkAPI: External or internal dataset comparing this stock against sector averages for key KPIs

function: Contrast the stock’s performance and health against standard industry measures.
static_description: Side-by-side comparison table or bar chart showing differences between company and industry average values for metrics like PE ratio, ROE, revenue growth. Highlighted disparities in navy/blue tones.

interaction_and_states.description: Displays explanation of what each metric signifies when hovering over its label.

resource_dependency.websocketConnection: Real-time connection to live stock feed via WebSocket protocol
resource_dependency.liveUpdateIndicator: UI element indicating active/live data stream (e.g., pulsating dot)

function: Keep all displayed data synchronized with live market conditions without manual refresh.
static_description: Small indicator light next to dynamic components turns green when receiving live updates. Current price and relevant charts update automatically every few seconds.

resource_dependency.componentColorOverrides: Navy-specific overrides applied to form inputs, buttons, cards, and text

function: Ensure uniform visual identity throughout the application using predefined color palette.
static_description: All interface components feature clean white backgrounds with navy accents for borders, icons, buttons, and typography. Consistent spacing and alignment enforced globally.
